fileheader.author: Erik Hofman, Nikolai V. Chr.
fileheader.note:
This model was created using data that is, or has been, publically available by means of technical reports, textbooks, image graphs or published code. This aircraft description file is in no way related to the manufacturer of the real aircraft. Neither the name of (any of) the authors nor the names of (any of) the manufacturers may be used to endorse or promote products derived from this file.
The data is provided ''as is'' and any express or implied warranties, including, but not limitted to the implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose are disclaimed.
